title: Scrape data from a web page

url.title: Base URL
url.description: Enter the main URL to start the scan. The actor will crawl this URL and its linked child pages, checking for spelling and grammar errors across the entire website structure.

openaiApiKey.title: OpenAI API key
openaiApiKey.description: The API key for accessing OpenAI. You can get it from OpenAI platform.

maxCrawlDepth.title: Max Crawling Depth
maxCrawlDepth.description: Set the maximum level of pages to scan, starting from the initial URL. A depth of 0 checks only the start URLs, while higher values allow the actor to follow and scan links on subsequent pages, controlling how deep the scan goes into the website.

maxCrawlPages.title: Max Pages
maxCrawlPages.description: Set the maximum number of pages to scan, including start URLs, paginated pages, and any other linked content. The scan will stop automatically once this limit is reached, helping to control the scope of the crawl.

severityLevel.title: Only High Severity Mistakes
severityLevel.description: Enable this option to filter the report and display only high-severity spelling and grammar mistakes, helping you focus on the most critical issues.
